tool.name: Monocle3 plotCells

param.name: xdim
param.label: The column of reducedDimS(cds) to plot on the horizontal axis.

param.name: ydim
param.label: The column of reducedDimS(cds) to plot on the vertical axis.

param.name: color_cells_by
param.label: The cell attribute (e.g. the column of pData(cds)) to map to each cell's color, or one of {clusters, partitions, pseudotime}.

param.name: genes
param.label: A list of gene IDs/short names to plot, one per panel.

param.name: norm_method
param.label: Determines how to transform expression values for plotting.
param.option: Size factor correction and log transformation

param.name: cell_size
param.label: The size of the point for each cell.

param.name: alpha
param.label: The alpha aesthetics for the original cell points, useful to highlight the learned principal graph.

param.name: label_cell_groups
param.label: If set, display the cell group names directly on the plot. Otherwise include a color legend on the side of the plot.

param.name: no_trajectory_graph
param.label: When this option is set, skip displaying the trajectory graph inferred by learn_graph().

param.name: label_groups_by_cluster
param.label: If set, and setting --color-cells-by to something other than cluster, label the cells of each cluster independently. Can result in duplicate labels being present in the manifold.

param.name: label_leaves
param.label: If set, label the leaves of the principal graph.

param.name: label_roots
param.label: If set, label the roots of the principal graph.

param.name: label_branch_points
param.label: If set, label the branch points of the principal graph.
